title: The Asset Allocator: An Outside Perspective
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The advantage of financial advice is the outsider’s perspective, which is the reason so many professional fields of counseling, coaching and training continue to expand. This podcast (6:02) argues that just as a prisoner cannot free himself, so too it is the outsider that can provide the discipline or the method to get the person to make progress in the area of life he or she is challenged by. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
